phrs.translation: 血腥的, 流血的比较级

sentences.sentence: This year could be even bloodier.
Yet we see it everywhere, becoming bloodier all the time.
sentences.translation: 然而，它却无处不在，无时不见血腥。

sentences.sentence: Several issues, if mishandled, could reignite a bloodier conflict all over again.
sentences.translation: 一些问题如果处理不当可能会再次引发更加血腥的冲突。
